sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_ORDER_CANCEL_REASON_INFO.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into ORDER_CANCEL_REASON (ID, USER_ACCOUNT, ORDER_CODE, HANDLE_STATUS, CREATE_DATE, COMPLETE_DATE, REASON, MEMBER_NO, REMARK) values (#id:DECIMAL#, #userAccount#, #orderCode#, #handleStatus#, #createDate#, #completeDate#, #reason#, #memberNo#, #remark#)
